title: Suggestions for a similar font to Mrs. Eaves...
content:
Does anyone have a suggestion for a font that is similar to Mrs Eaves but easier to work with? (not as much kerning, tracking and other tweaking required.)

Thanks!
author: bfingeroth

comments.content: Although it's a bit different (larger x-height, heavier, lower contrast) I've had good results recently with [Libre Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425090608/http:/www.impallari.com/projects/overview/libre-baskerville).
